about_the_game:
A pack of three games in one! Use your phones as controllers and play three fully-fledged digital board games for the price of one rather inexpensive real life-board game, designed with care from us!




Bajillions! The Trivia game for people who don't like trivia. Which number is bigger? The number of streetlights in the world, or the number of rats in New York City? Bet on which is bigger, and risk it all to bring home a win! We spent hundreds of hours making sure the facts are legit. 2-20 players, great for drop-in-drop-out play.

Unrealty: Ever find yourself trying to sell your friend a treehouse that has a waterslide, a clockwork butler, and a Unicorn stable? No? Well you will if you're playing Unrealty! Everyone is a real estate agent, trying to sell fantastical houses to one of your friends, who is playing as a whimsical client. Houses have crazy upsides and hilarious downsides. Debate your friends on whose house is best, then play a Rumor on their houses to make them worse! The Improv game that helps players that are bad at improv. 3-7 players, great for close friends.

Little Stinkers: Pass around the net in this short and snappy game of trying to figure out whether or not your friend is telling the truth about what bugs in the net, or if they're a STINKER! If you get caught lying, or if you accuse someone incorrectly of lying, take a stinkbug. First to 3 stinkbugs LOSES and everyone else wins! 3-6 players, Great for dirty, stinking liars.

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains occasional text prompts referencing nudity and alluding to drug use. A Family-friendly mode is available in the settings menu.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1 Internet-connected device per player required for some games

  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent

short_description: Use your phones as controllers to play these 3 fantastic Party Games in one! Trivia game Bajillions, (2-20 players) Improv game Unrealty, (3-7) and the bluffing game Little Stinkers (2-6) are all here to give your next game night a spark! Works great in-person or online.
